parameters.name: Backend
parameters.description: The back-to-origin IP address or domain name.

parameters.name: CnameEnabled
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the public cloud disaster recovery feature is enabled for the domain name. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: Domain
parameters.description: The domain name that you want to query.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the WAF instance.

> You can call the [DescribeInstance](~~433756~~) operation to obtain the ID of the WAF instance.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the WAF instance. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou:** the Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1:** outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: ResourceManagerResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.
